== Video Overview ==

Many users will already have existing Windows systems which they would like to integrate with Ubuntu. This screencast shows how to allow Ubuntu to access files in shares on remote Windows systems.

== Target Audience ==

* Users

== Pre-requisites ==

* An appreication of the fundamentals of file sharing on Windows

== Required Knowledge ==

== Recommended Knowledge ==

== Objectives ==

* Describe which extra packages are required to enable accessing windows file shares
* Configure the system to mount remote file shares
